item.title: Apple brings Final Cut Pro & Logic Pro to iPad
item.description: - Final Cut Pro and Logic Pro for iPad are powerful tools designed for video and music creators to deliver the ultimate mobile studio experience.

item.title: Language models can explain neurons in language models
item.description: - Researchers propose an automated process that uses GPT-4 to produce and score natural language explanations of neuron behavior in language models.

item.title: Learning DNS in 10 Years
item.description: - The speaker at RubyConf Mini talked about "Learning DNS in 10 years" and took a structured approach to learning difficult concepts.

item.title: Apple just lost its lawsuit trying to ban iOS virtual machines
item.description: - US courts rule in favor of Corellium, allowing third-party virtual iOS devices for security research purposes - Corellium's CORSEC simulator is protected by copyright law's fair use doctrine - Concerns arise that developers may use Corellium's VMs to try out apps without acquiring the right hardware

item.title: UN Human Rights Chief Urges UK to Reverse 'Deeply Troubling' Public Order Bill
item.description: - This website is best experienced by visiting the website directly.

item.title: James Webb Space Telescope reveals Fomalhaut's disk in detail
item.description: - This website is best experienced by visiting the website directly.

item.title: CheerpJ 3.0: a JVM replacement in HTML5 & WASM to run Java on modern browsers
item.description: - CheerpJ is a technology that allows developers to run Java applications on modern browsers through HTML5 and WebAssembly (WASM).

item.title: Reduced cancer mortality with daily Vitamin D intake
item.description: - Daily intake of vitamin D could reduce cancer mortality in the population by 12%, according to an evaluation of 14 studies conducted by the German Cancer Research Center with almost 105,000 participants.

item.title: Syncthing: A continuous file synchronization program
item.description: - Syncthing is a program that synchronizes files between two or more computers in real-time and is protected from unauthorized access.

item.title: Tinder for Canceling Meetings
item.description: - A new app called Cala is being referred to as "Tinder for canceling meetings."
